# Spurious regression 

```{r}
set.seed(2113)
n = 100
e = replicate(4, {
rnorm(100, 0, 1)
})
e1 = e[, 1]
e2 = e[, 2]
e3 = e[, 3]
e4 = e[, 4]
Y = c(1)
X1 = c(1)
X2 = c(1)
X3 = c(1)
t = 1:n
for (t in 2:n) {
Y[t] <- Y[t - 1] + e1[t]
X1[t] <- X1[t - 1] + e2[t]
X2[t] <- X2[t - 1] + e3[t]
X3[t] <- X3[t - 1] + e4[t]
}
```


```{r}
par(mfrow = c(2, 2))
plot(Y, t = "l")
plot(X1, t = "l")
plot(X2, t = "l")
plot(X3, t = "l")

```
```{r}
library(dynlm)
summary(dynlm(Y ~ X1 + X2 + X3))

```

```{r}
summary(dynlm(Y ~ L(Y, 1) + X1 + X2 + X3))
```

```{r}
set.seed(2113)
n=80
e= replicate(4, {rnorm(100,0,1)} )
e1=e[,1]; e2=e[,2]
mu=0.5
Y=c(1); X=c(1);
t=1:n
for (t in 2:n) {
Y[t] <- mu + Y[t-1] + e1[t]
X[t] <- mu + X[t-1] + e2[t]
}
```
